thread.title: MusicNews | Adele releases moody new single 'Hello' - watch the video here now
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Adele releases moody new single 'Hello' - watch the video here now - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | Adele releases moody new single 'Hello' - watch the video here now
text:
It's finally here - the long-awaited first single from Adele's new album ' 25'.
Moody piano ballad 'Hello' was announced yesterday and is available to buy and stream from today.
The accompanying video was directed by Xavier Dolan and was shot in mid-October in Montreal. "It was a privilege to direct the music video for Adele's beautiful, heartbreaking song,” he said. “When I first heard it, all the images were already running by so clearly in my head - and her trust and generosity allowed me to create freely."
Watch the video below:
MORE: Adele's new album '25' is definitely out next month, with new single 'Hello' released tomorrow
MORE: Adele writes open letter to fans updating them on her new 'make-up' album, '25'
MORE: Adele to get her own TV show to mark new album in November
